original_text:
Dreamzone
La slot Dreamzone è un titolo Cluster Pays della ELK Studios. Giocato su una griglia 5 per 5, è necessario atterrare simboli adiacenti per formare cluster vincenti. Con le vittorie in valanga, si raccolgono le caratteristiche del Dreamzone quando si vince, in modo da poterlo utilizzare negli Spin non vincenti. Con 4 di esse di cui beneficiare, entrano in gioco anche nella funzione Bonus Drops, dove ogni livello ti dà più giri gratis e raddoppia il moltiplicatore, fino a 512x.
Dreamzone è dotato di cinque file orizzontali e cinque file verticali che possono formare dei win-cluster con almeno tre simboli. I risultati delle vittorie vengono tolti dal quadro, ma solo per essere sostituiti da nuovi simboli, che possono a loro volta creare dei cluster. Il gioco ha una varianza medio-alta e un ritorno teorico al giocatore del 96,00% – giusto in media.
Una grafica 3D e preziosa
Per quanto riguarda la grafica, gli esperti di slot di ELK Gaming hanno dato al gioco un tema spaziale che si svolge in un mondo multidimensionale, che, ovviamente, deve apparire in 3D per il bene della nostra sanità mentale. I simboli sono forme cristalline multiangolari, che vanno dai cuori ai coni, alle stelle e ai cubi.
La slot Dreamzone riesce bene a intrattenere il nostro campo visivo. Man mano che si ottengono le vittorie, la struttura dei simboli si disintegra e la loro impalcatura molecolare viene gettata nello spazio, ma non a lungo, perché un’altra serie di simboli si materializza rapidamente sulla griglia, per avere la possibilità di produrre un’altra vittoria. Un altro dettaglio impressionante è il tema del suono, che si trova proprio nel vicolo degli amanti del genere fantascientifico.
La slot Dreamzone ha un tema ispirato allo spazio ed è descritto dallo sviluppatore come uno “stato oltre il tempo e il luogo”. Con uno sfondo scuro dello spazio esterno, i simboli luminosi e colorati al neon contrastano in modo netto per dare vita al gameplay. La colonna sonora è moderna e vi ricorderà un po’ lo Starburst di NetEnt.
I simboli sulle bobine includono pietre preziose di basso valore. I simboli di alto valore appaiono in 3D con la gemma rossa il simbolo più prezioso. 11 o più in un cluster vincente si tradurrà in un payout di 100 x puntate. Il simbolo ‘W’ è il simbolo jolly.
Con ELK come primo sviluppatore mobile, Dreamzone si può giocare su dispositivi mobile, tablet e desktop come standard. La griglia 5×5 sembra piuttosto buona sugli schermi degli smartphone.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Gli ELK Studios hanno i loro controlli e la disposizione dei pulsanti replicata anche su questo gioco. Sul lato destro delle bobine ci sono i pulsanti per Spin e Autoplay. A sinistra, in basso c’è il pulsante delle pile di monete e nell’angolo superiore il menu.
Premendo una volta il pulsante di rotazione, i rulli girano una volta per l’importo della puntata attiva. I giocatori possono premere Spin per ogni turno o giocare la partita in modalità Autoplay. Premendo quel pulsante si apre il menu in cui è possibile scegliere il numero di giri automatici.
Le impostazioni opzionali relative a quanto sopra includono l’aggiunta di condizioni che fermano i rotazioni automatiche quando sono state soddisfatte, come ad esempio una singola vincita che si verifica o una perdita totale del saldo.
Per scegliere le scommesse e giocare alla slot Dreamzone, selezionare il simbolo delle pile di monete. La gamma di scommesse inizia con 20 centesimi e termina con un massimo di €100.00 per giro. Ci sono importi multipli che permettono ai giocatori di scegliere una scommessa adeguata.
Le vincite in questo gioco sono fatte con almeno tre simboli che sono collegati uno accanto all’altro. Quando viene effettuata una vincita, il gioco scatena delle valanghe. Queste possono continuare ininterrottamente finché ci sono nuovi simboli vincenti. Inoltre, ogni valanga viene fornita con un moltiplicatore, ma questo è nella funzione bonus.
La slot Dreamzone ha un simbolo jolly che può sostituire uno qualsiasi dei simboli standard. In termini di valori, ci sono due categorie di simboli. I simboli a basso costo sono le piccole gemme, cinque in numero. I loro valori variano tra 0,1x e 0,3 per i gruppi di tre. 11 o più simboli possono pagare tra 4,8x e 6x.
I simboli che pagano di più sono i cristalli più grandi. Il viola paga 0,4x e il rosso 1x per tre. Il simbolo più prezioso è quello a forma di oggetto rosso, che paga 100x per 11 o più simboli.
La cosa unica e sorprendente di questo gioco è che anche le gocce non vincenti che fanno parte di una valanga possono far sì che la valanga continui. Questo è possibile grazie alle Caratteristiche del Sogno, che vengono raccolte insieme al gameplay.
Le caratteristiche dette sono Wilds, per aggiungere fino a cinque wilds; Symbol Explore che rimuove fino a quattro simboli; Symbol Upgrade aggiorna i simboli delle vittorie basse ai corrispondenti alti; e il simbolo scatter che paga le vittorie sparse.
Rimuovendo tutti i simboli dalla griglia, si ottiene la funzione di bonus a gocce gratuite. Durante questa operazione, ogni goccia risulta in un moltiplicatore di 2x e questa cifra viene moltiplicata per 2x per ogni vittoria consecutiva. L’importo massimo del moltiplicatore che Dreamzone è in grado di generare è 512x.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Euphoria è la Slot Machine di iSoftbet dotata di moltiplicatori, wilds e una funzione buy che ti dà un bonus di giri gratis al costo di 100x sulla scommessa attiva. I moltiplicatori durante il bonus possono impilare sopra i rulli e moltiplicano ciò che è già presente. Questo potrebbe portare a vittorie potenzialmente enormi per coloro che sono fortunati ad ottenere simboli stellari ripetuti.

raw_translation.response:
Dreamzone

The Dreamzone slot game is a Cluster Pays title from ELK Studios. Played on a 5x5 grid, you need to land adjacent symbols to form winning clusters. With cascading wins, you collect Dreamzone Features on each win, which you can use in non-winning Spins. With 4 of them to benefit from, they also come into play in the Bonus Drops feature, where each level gives you more free spins and doubles the multiplier, up to 512x.

Dreamzone features five horizontal and five vertical reels that can form win clusters with at least three symbols. The results of the wins are removed from the board, but only to be replaced by new symbols, which can themselves create clusters. The game has medium-high variance and a theoretical return to player of 96.00% - just average.

A 3D and Precious Graphics

Regarding the graphics, ELK Gaming's slot experts gave the game a spatial theme that takes place in a multidimensional world, which, of course, must appear in 3D for the sake of our mental health. The symbols are multi-angular crystal shapes, ranging from hearts to cones, stars and cubes.

The Dreamzone slot does a great job of entertaining our visual field. As wins are achieved, the structure of the symbols disintegrates and their molecular scaffold is cast into space, but not for long, because another set of symbols quickly materializes on the grid, to have a chance of producing another win. Another impressive detail is the sound theme, which is right up the alley of sci-fi enthusiasts.

The Dreamzone slot has a space-inspired theme and is described by the developer as a "state beyond time and place". With a dark outer space background, the bright and colorful neon symbols contrast sharply to bring the gameplay to life. The soundtrack is modern and will remind you a bit of NetEnt's Starburst.

Symbols on the reels include low-value gems. High-value symbols appear in 3D with the red gem being the most valuable symbol. 11 or more in a winning cluster will translate into a payout of 100 x bets. The ‘W’ symbol is the wild symbol.

With ELK as the first mobile developer, Dreamzone can be played on mobile devices, tablets, and desktops as standard. The 5x5 grid looks quite good on smartphone screens.

Functions and Symbols of the Slot Machine

ELK Studios has their controls and button layout replicated even in this game. On the right side of the reels are the Spin and Autoplay buttons. On the lower left, there is the coin stack button, and in the upper corner, the menu.

Pressing the rotation button once spins the reels once for the amount of the active bet. Players can press Spin for each turn or play the game in Autoplay mode. Pressing that button opens the menu where you can choose the number of automatic spins.

Optional settings related to the above include adding conditions that stop automatic spins when they have been met, such as a single win that occurs or a total loss of balance.

To choose bets and play the Dreamzone slot, select the coin stack symbol. The betting range starts at 20 cents and ends at a maximum of €100.00 per spin. There are multiple amounts that allow players to choose a suitable bet.

Wins in this game are made with at least three symbols that are connected next to each other. When a win is made, the game triggers cascades. These can continue uninterrupted until there are new winning symbols. In addition, each cascade comes with a multiplier, but this is in the bonus function.

The Dreamzone slot has a wild symbol that can replace any of the standard symbols. In terms of values, there are two categories of symbols. The low-cost symbols are the small gems, five in number. Their values range from 0.1x to 0.3 for groups of three. 11 or more symbols can pay between 4.8x and 6x.

The symbols that pay the most are the larger crystals. The purple pays 0.4x and the red 1x for three. The most valuable symbol is the red object-shaped one, which pays 100x for 11 or more symbols.

The unique and surprising thing about this game is that even non-winning drops that are part of a cascade can continue the cascade. This is possible thanks to the Dream Features, which are collected together with the gameplay.

The said features are Wilds, to add up to five wilds; Symbol Explore that removes up to four symbols; Symbol Upgrade upgrades low winning symbols to their higher counterparts; and the scatter symbol that pays out scattered wins.

By removing all symbols from the grid, you get the free drop bonus feature. During this operation, each drop results in a 2x multiplier, and this figure is multiplied by 2x for each consecutive win. The maximum amount of multiplier that Dreamzone is capable of generating is 512x.

Other Similar Slot Machines

Euphoria is iSoftbet's slot machine with multipliers, wilds, and a buy feature that gives you a bonus of free spins at a cost of 100x the active bet. The multipliers during the bonus can stack on top of the reels and multiply what is already there. This could lead to potentially huge wins for those lucky enough to get repeated star symbols.

Con ELK come primo sviluppatore mobile, Dreamzone si può giocare su dispositivi mobile, tablet e desktop come standard. La griglia 5×5 sembra piuttosto buona sugli schermi degli smartphone.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Gli ELK Studios hanno i loro controlli e la disposizione dei pulsanti replicata anche su questo gioco. Sul lato destro delle bobine ci sono i pulsanti per Spin e Autoplay. A sinistra, in basso c’è il pulsante delle pile di monete e nell’angolo superiore il menu.
Premendo una volta il pulsante di rotazione, i rulli girano una volta per l’importo della puntata attiva. I giocatori possono premere Spin per ogni turno o giocare la partita in modalità Autoplay. Premendo quel pulsante si apre il menu in cui è possibile scegliere il numero di giri automatici.
Le impostazioni opzionali relative a quanto sopra includono l’aggiunta di condizioni che fermano i rotazioni automatiche quando sono state soddisfatte, come ad esempio una singola vincita che si verifica o una perdita totale del saldo.
Per scegliere le scommesse e giocare alla slot Dreamzone, selezionare il simbolo delle pile di monete. La gamma di scommesse inizia con 20 centesimi e termina con un massimo di €100.00 per giro. Ci sono importi multipli che permettono ai giocatori di scegliere una scommessa adeguata.
Le vincite in questo gioco sono fatte con almeno tre simboli che sono collegati uno accanto all’altro. Quando viene effettuata una vincita, il gioco scatena delle valanghe. Queste possono continuare ininterrottamente finché ci sono nuovi simboli vincenti. Inoltre, ogni valanga viene fornita con un moltiplicatore, ma questo è nella funzione bonus.
La slot Dreamzone ha un simbolo jolly che può sostituire uno qualsiasi dei simboli standard. In termini di valori, ci sono due categorie di simboli. I simboli a basso costo sono le piccole gemme, cinque in numero. I loro valori variano tra 0,1x e 0,3 per i gruppi di tre. 11 o più simboli possono pagare tra 4,8x e 6x.
I simboli che pagano di più sono i cristalli più grandi. Il viola paga 0,4x e il rosso 1x per tre. Il simbolo più prezioso è quello a forma di oggetto rosso, che paga 100x per 11 o più simboli.
La cosa unica e sorprendente di questo gioco è che anche le gocce non vincenti che fanno parte di una valanga possono far sì che la valanga continui. Questo è possibile grazie alle Caratteristiche del Sogno, che vengono raccolte insieme al gameplay.
Le caratteristiche dette sono Wilds, per aggiungere fino a cinque wilds; Symbol Explore che rimuove fino a quattro simboli; Symbol Upgrade aggiorna i simboli delle vittorie basse ai corrispondenti alti; e il simbolo scatter che paga le vittorie sparse.
Rimuovendo tutti i simboli dalla griglia, si ottiene la funzione di bonus a gocce gratuite. Durante questa operazione, ogni goccia risulta in un moltiplicatore di 2x e questa cifra viene moltiplicata per 2x per ogni vittoria consecutiva. L’importo massimo del moltiplicatore che Dreamzone è in grado di generare è 512x.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Euphoria è la Slot Machine di iSoftbet dotata di moltiplicatori, wilds e una funzione buy che ti dà un bonus di giri gratis al costo di 100x sulla scommessa attiva. I moltiplicatori durante il bonus possono impilare sopra i rulli e moltiplicano ciò che è già presente. Questo potrebbe portare a vittorie potenzialmente enormi per coloro che sono fortunati ad ottenere simboli stellari ripetuti.

message.content:
Dreamzone
The Dreamzone slot is an ELK Studios' Cluster Pays title. Played on a 5x5 grid, you must land adjacent symbols to form winning clusters. With avalanche wins, you collect Dreamzone features when you win, so you can use them in non-winning spins. With 4 to benefit from, they also come into play in the Bonus Drops feature, where each level gives you more free spins and doubles the multiplier, up to 512x.
Dreamzone features five horizontal and five vertical arrays that can form win clusters with at least three symbols. Winning results are removed from the board, but only to be replaced by new symbols, which can, in turn, create clusters. The game has medium-high variance and a theoretical return to player of 96.00% - fair on average.
Stunning 3D Graphics
When it comes to graphics, ELK Gaming's slot experts gave the game a space theme set in a multidimensional world that obviously had to appear in 3D for the sake of our mental health. The symbols are multi-angled crystalline shapes, ranging from hearts to cones, stars, and cubes.
The Dreamzone slot is successful in entertaining our visual field. As you achieve wins, the structure of the symbols disintegrates, and their molecular scaffold is thrown into space, but not for long, because another set of symbols materializes quickly on the grid, giving you the chance to produce another win. Another impressive detail is the sound theme, which is right up the alley of sci-fi lovers.
The Dreamzone slot has a space-inspired theme, described by the developer as a "state beyond time and place." With a dark background of outer space, the bright neon-colored symbols contrast sharply to give life to the gameplay. The soundtrack is modern and will remind you a bit of NetEnt's Starburst.
Symbols on the reels include low-value gemstones. High-value symbols appear in 3D with the red gem being the most precious symbol. 11 or more in a winning cluster will result in a payout of 100 x bets. The 'W' symbol is the wild symbol.
As ELK's first mobile developer, Dreamzone can be played on mobile devices, tablets, and desktops as standard. The 5x5 grid looks pretty good on smartphone screens.
Slot Machine Features and Symbols
ELK Studios has replicated its controls and button layout even with this game. On the right side of the reels, there are buttons for Spin and Autoplay. On the left, at the bottom, is the button for the coin stacks, and in the upper corner is the menu.
Pressing the spin button once spins the reels once for the active bet amount. Players can press Spin for every turn or play the game in Autoplay mode. Pressing that button opens the menu where you can choose the number of automatic spins.
Optional settings related to the above include adding conditions that stop automatic spins when they have been satisfied, such as a single win that occurs or a total loss of the balance.
To choose bets and play the Dreamzone slot, select the coin stack symbol. The betting range starts at 20 cents and ends at a maximum of €100.00 per spin. There are multiple amounts that allow players to choose an appropriate bet.
Wins in this game are made with at least three symbols that are connected next to each other. When a win is made, the game triggers cascades. These can continue uninterrupted until there are new winning symbols. Additionally, each cascade comes with a multiplier, but this is in the bonus feature.
The Dreamzone slot has a wild symbol that can replace any of the standard symbols. In terms of values, there are two categories of symbols. The low-cost symbols are the small gems, five in number. Their values range from 0.1x to 0.3 for groups of three. 11 or more symbols can pay between 4.8x and 6x.
The highest paying symbols are the larger crystals. Purple pays 0.4x and red pays 1x for three. The most valuable symbol is the red object-shaped one, which pays 100x for 11 or more symbols.
The unique and surprising thing about this game is that even non-winning drops that are part of a cascade can ensure that the cascade continues. This is possible thanks to Dream Features, which are collected together while playing.
The said features are Wilds, to add up to five wilds; Symbol Explore, which removes up to four symbols; Symbol Upgrade upgrades low winning symbols to their corresponding highs; and the scatter symbol that pays out scattered wins.
Removing all symbols from the grid triggers the free drops bonus feature. During this, every drop results in a 2x multiplier, and this figure is multiplied by 2x for each consecutive win. The maximum multiplier amount that Dreamzone is capable of generating is 512x.
Other Similar Slot Machines
Euphoria is iSoftbet's slot machine with multipliers, wilds, and a buy feature that gives you a free spins bonus at a cost of 100x on the active bet. Multipliers during the bonus can stack above the reels and multiply what is already present, potentially leading to huge wins for those lucky enough to get repeated stellar symbols.

Regarding the graphics, ELK Gaming's slot experts gave the game a spatial theme that takes place in a multidimensional world, which, of course, must appear in 3D for the sake of our mental health. The symbols are multi-angular crystal shapes, ranging from hearts to cones, stars and cubes.

The Dreamzone slot does a great job of entertaining our visual field. As wins are achieved, the structure of the symbols disintegrates and their molecular scaffold is cast into space, but not for long, because another set of symbols quickly materializes on the grid, to have a chance of producing another win. Another impressive detail is the sound theme, which is right up the alley of sci-fi enthusiasts.

The Dreamzone slot has a space-inspired theme and is described by the developer as a "state beyond time and place". With a dark outer space background, the bright and colorful neon symbols contrast sharply to bring the gameplay to life. The soundtrack is modern and will remind you a bit of NetEnt's Starburst.

Symbols on the reels include low-value gems. High-value symbols appear in 3D with the red gem being the most valuable symbol. 11 or more in a winning cluster will translate into a payout of 100 x bets. The ‘W’ symbol is the wild symbol.

With ELK as the first mobile developer, Dreamzone can be played on mobile devices, tablets, and desktops as standard. The 5x5 grid looks quite good on smartphone screens.

Functions and Symbols of the Slot Machine

ELK Studios has their controls and button layout replicated even in this game. On the right side of the reels are the Spin and Autoplay buttons. On the lower left, there is the coin stack button, and in the upper corner, the menu.

Pressing the rotation button once spins the reels once for the amount of the active bet. Players can press Spin for each turn or play the game in Autoplay mode. Pressing that button opens the menu where you can choose the number of automatic spins.

Optional settings related to the above include adding conditions that stop automatic spins when they have been met, such as a single win that occurs or a total loss of balance.

To choose bets and play the Dreamzone slot, select the coin stack symbol. The betting range starts at 20 cents and ends at a maximum of €100.00 per spin. There are multiple amounts that allow players to choose a suitable bet.

Wins in this game are made with at least three symbols that are connected next to each other. When a win is made, the game triggers cascades. These can continue uninterrupted until there are new winning symbols. In addition, each cascade comes with a multiplier, but this is in the bonus function.

The Dreamzone slot has a wild symbol that can replace any of the standard symbols. In terms of values, there are two categories of symbols. The low-cost symbols are the small gems, five in number. Their values range from 0.1x to 0.3 for groups of three. 11 or more symbols can pay between 4.8x and 6x.

The symbols that pay the most are the larger crystals. The purple pays 0.4x and the red 1x for three. The most valuable symbol is the red object-shaped one, which pays 100x for 11 or more symbols.

The unique and surprising thing about this game is that even non-winning drops that are part of a cascade can continue the cascade. This is possible thanks to the Dream Features, which are collected together with the gameplay.

The said features are Wilds, to add up to five wilds; Symbol Explore that removes up to four symbols; Symbol Upgrade upgrades low winning symbols to their higher counterparts; and the scatter symbol that pays out scattered wins.

By removing all symbols from the grid, you get the free drop bonus feature. During this operation, each drop results in a 2x multiplier, and this figure is multiplied by 2x for each consecutive win. The maximum amount of multiplier that Dreamzone is capable of generating is 512x.

The multipliers during the bonus can stack on top of the reels and multiply what is already there. This could lead to potentially huge wins for those lucky enough to get repeated star symbols.

response.headline: Symbols and Values
response.content:
If you love the sight of elegant crystal shapes, then Dreamzone is the slot game for you. The game features a range of crystal symbols that evoke thoughts of exploration, adventure, and the majesty of nature. The red gem is the highest paying symbol, and rightly so. That little crystal looks like it could power a spaceship, fight off an army of robots, or even grant wishes. The smaller gems don't quite match the value of the red gem, but they're still worth collecting for groups of three. As you keep collecting, you'll be happy to know that 11 or more of these shiny rocks pay out between 4.8x and 6x.

The larger crystals are where the big payouts come into play. These grand beauties sparkle with a light that can blind you enough to make you want to keep spinning the reels. The red, object-shaped crystal is the most valuable symbol on the game and when you land 11 or more symbols, get ready to turn up in style as you collect a payout of 100x your bet. Now, that could buy you a pretty penny in real life.

To make your time spinning the reels even more enjoyable, Dreamzone also features a wild symbol. The 'W' symbol can replace any of the standard symbols, making it easier for you to land a winning combination. So, whenever you see the 'W', know that it's a symbol of good luck and a chance to boost your payouts.

response.headline: Dreamzone Features
response.content:
If you're looking for a slot game with unique features that can make your dreams come true, you'll love Dreamzone. One of its unique features is the Dream Features - which can add some extra excitement to your gameplay. These are collected alongside the gameplay and can be used in non-winning spins.

The Wilds feature is one of the best Dream Features available in Dreamzone. It adds up to five wilds, which can increase the chances of creating winning clusters. This is especially helpful when you're close to winning and just need that little push.

Another great Dream Feature is Symbol Explore. This feature removes up to four symbols from the grid, making space for new symbols to drop. This increases the chance of creating new clusters and potentially winning big.

If you're looking to boost your payout, then Symbol Upgrade is the feature for you. This feature upgrades low-value symbols to their higher-paying counterparts, which can increase the payout significantly.

Last but not least, Scatter symbol pays out scattered wins if you land three or more, increasing the total payout of each spin.

Overall, Dreamzone has a great selection of features that can add excitement and potential payouts to your gameplay. Just make sure to use them wisely - you wouldn't want to waste them on a losing spin!

Review:
 
Gameplay Features

Dreamzone is a Cluster Pays slot game with a 5x5 grid. You need to land adjacent symbols to form winning clusters. With cascading wins, you collect Dreamzone Features on each win, which you can use in non-winning Spins. With 4 of them to benefit from, they also come into play in the Bonus Drops feature, where each level gives you more free spins and doubles the multiplier, up to 512x.

Visuals and Theme

Dreamzone has a space-inspired theme and is described by the developer as a 'state beyond time and place'. With a dark outer space background, the bright and colorful neon symbols contrast sharply to bring the gameplay to life. The sound theme is reminiscent of sci-fi, and the symbols are multi-angular crystal shapes, ranging from hearts to cones, stars, and cubes. The game is designed in 3D with precious graphics that entertain our visual field.

Bonus Features

Dreamzone has a Free Drop Bonus feature, which is triggered when all symbols are removed from the grid. During this feature, each drop results in a 2x multiplier, and this figure is multiplied by 2x for each consecutive win. The maximum amount of multiplier that Dreamzone is capable of generating is 512x. The game also has four Dream Features that are collected together with the gameplay: Wilds, Symbol Explore, Symbol Upgrade, and Scatter symbol.

Variance and RTP

Dreamzone has a medium-high variance and a theoretical return to player of 96.00% - just average.

Symbols and Betting Range

Symbols on the reels include low-value gems. High-value symbols appear in 3D with the red gem being the most valuable symbol. Players can choose bets and play the Dreamzone slot by selecting the coin stack symbol. The betting range starts at 20 cents and ends at a maximum of €100.00 per spin.

Availability on Different Devices

Dreamzone can be played on mobile devices, tablets, and desktop computers.

Wild Symbol and Symbol Categories

The 'W' symbol in Dreamzone is the game's wild symbol that can replace any of the standard symbols. In terms of values, there are two categories of symbols. The low-cost symbols are the small gems, and five are available in number. Their values range from 0.1x to 0.3 for groups of three. 11 or more symbols can pay between 4.8x and 6x. The symbols that pay the most are the larger crystals. The purple pays 0.4x and the red 1x for three. The most valuable symbol is the red object-shaped one, which pays 100x for 11 or more symbols.

Non-Winning Drops and Dream Features

Even non-winning drops that are part of a cascade in Dreamzone can continue the cascade. This is possible thanks to the Dream Features, which are collected together with the gameplay. The features are Wilds, Symbol Explore, Symbol Upgrade, and the Scatter symbol that pays out scattered wins.

ELK Studios has their controls and button layout replicated even in this game. On the right side of the reels are the Spin and Autoplay buttons. On the lower left, there is the coin stack button, and in the upper corner, the menu.

Pressing the rotation button once spins the reels once for the amount of the active bet. Players can press Spin for each turn or play the game in Autoplay mode. Pressing that button opens the menu where you can choose the number of automatic spins.

Optional settings related to the above include adding conditions that stop automatic spins when they have been met, such as a single win that occurs or a total loss of balance.

To choose bets and play the Dreamzone slot, select the coin stack symbol. The betting range starts at 20 cents and ends at a maximum of €100.00 per spin. There are multiple amounts that allow players to choose a suitable bet.

Wins in this game are made with at least three symbols that are connected next to each other. When a win is made, the game triggers cascades. These can continue uninterrupted until there are new winning symbols. In addition, each cascade comes with a multiplier, but this is in the bonus function.

The Dreamzone slot has a wild symbol that can replace any of the standard symbols. In terms of values, there are two categories of symbols. The low-cost symbols are the small gems, five in number. Their values range from 0.1x to 0.3 for groups of three. 11 or more symbols can pay between 4.8x and 6x.

The symbols that pay the most are the larger crystals. The purple pays 0.4x and the red 1x for three. The most valuable symbol is the red object-shaped one, which pays 100x for 11 or more symbols.

The unique and surprising thing about this game is that even non-winning drops that are part of a cascade can continue the cascade. This is possible thanks to the Dream Features, which are collected together with the gameplay.

The said features are Wilds, to add up to five wilds; Symbol Explore that removes up to four symbols; Symbol Upgrade upgrades low winning symbols to their higher counterparts; and the scatter symbol that pays out scattered wins.

By removing all symbols from the grid, you get the free drop bonus feature. During this operation, each drop results in a 2x multiplier, and this figure is multiplied by 2x for each consecutive win. The maximum amount of multiplier that Dreamzone is capable of generating is 512x.

The multipliers during the bonus can stack on top of the reels and multiply what is already there. This could lead to potentially huge wins for those lucky enough to get repeated star symbols.
